name: Paw.io
description:
How to play
Hold and drag left mouse button to move. If you have more followers than the numbers on top of the buildings you can get inside the buildings and collect them too.
Top left corner indicates how many followers you have.
Top right corner shows the leaderboard of the current game.

Description
Do you like io games? This is the cutest one! Collect humans to be the one with most followers. Find more people to pet your cat and become the cutest!
